name: SQL Learning Library
description: Comprehensive SQL lessons from beginner to advanced

decks.name: SQL Fundamentals
decks.description: Essential SELECT, WHERE, ORDER BY, and basic clauses

decks.name: SQL Joins
decks.description: Master all join types: INNER, LEFT, RIGHT, FULL, CROSS, SELF

decks.name: Aggregation & Grouping
decks.description: COUNT, SUM, AVG, GROUP BY, HAVING, ROLLUP, CUBE

decks.name: Window Functions & CTEs
decks.description: ROW_NUMBER, RANK, LAG, LEAD, WITH clauses, recursive CTEs
